mapper.insert: INSERT INTO albums( id, name, publisher, picUrl, playCount, singerId, remark, createdAt ) VALUES ( #{albumId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{albumName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisher, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{albumPictureUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plays, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singerId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id albumId, a.name albumName, a.publisher publisher, a.picUrl albumPictureUrl, a.playCount plays, a.singerId singerId, a.remark remark, DATE_FORMAT(a.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.updatedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateTime FROM albums a WHERE a.id = #{albumId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
